name: Murf AI
description: Murf AI is an AI-powered text-to-speech platform that creates realistic voiceovers for various content needs.
longDescription: Murf AI is an advanced text-to-speech platform that leverages artificial intelligence to transform written text into lifelike voiceovers, enabling users to create professional audio content without recording equipment. Founded in October 2020 by Sneha Roy, Ankur Edkie, and Divyanshu Pandey, the company aims to simplify voiceover creation for creators, businesses, and enterprises. It supports a wide range of applications, including podcasts, e-learning, advertisements, and audiobooks, with over 200 voices in 20+ languages. The platformâ€™s intuitive interface and customization options allow users to fine-tune pitch, tone, and pronunciation, ensuring high-quality, human-like audio. Murf AI serves global customers, including major companies like Cisco and Pfizer, and emphasizes data security with SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, and GDPR compliance. Its mission is to make high-quality voiceovers accessible, reducing production time and costs significantly.
features: Generate ultra-realistic voiceovers from text using over 200 AI voices in 20+ languages for diverse applications.
Customize pitch, speed, pauses, and emphasis to create tailored audio that matches specific project needs.
Integrate seamlessly with tools like Canva, Google Slides, and Adobe Audition to streamline content creation workflows.
Use the Voice Changer API to convert existing audio files into high-quality AI-generated voices.
Access millions of stock music, images, and videos to enhance video and presentation projects within the platform.
Enable team collaboration through shared workspaces and custom pronunciation libraries for consistent brand voice.
Leverage the TTS Streaming API for real-time, low-latency voice generation in conversational AI or virtual assistants.
Ensure data security with end-to-end encryption, GDPR compliance, and robust access management protocols.
Create multilingual content with voices that switch languages naturally within or across sentences.
Use voice cloning (Enterprise plan) to replicate specific voices for branded, personalized audio content.

faqs.question: What is Murf AI used for?
faqs.answer: Murf AI converts text into realistic voiceovers for podcasts, videos, e-learning, advertisements, and more, using AI-driven technology.

faqs.question: Does Murf AI offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Murf AI provides a free plan with up to 10 minutes of voice generation, but projects cannot be exported without upgrading.

faqs.question: How many languages does Murf AI support?
faqs.answer: Murf AI supports over 20 languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, and Hindi, with various accents.

faqs.question: Can I customize the AI voices?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can adjust pitch, speed, tone, pauses, and pronunciation to create tailored, human-like voiceovers.

faqs.question: Is Murf AI secure for enterprise use?
faqs.answer: Murf AI ensures data security with SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, GDPR compliance, and end-to-end encryption.

faqs.question: Can Murf AI integrate with other tools?
faqs.answer: Murf AI integrates with platforms like Canva, Google Slides, and Adobe Audition for seamless content creation.

faqs.question: What is the pronunciation accuracy of Murf AI?
faqs.answer: Murf AI achieves 99.38% pronunciation accuracy across multiple languages, ensuring high-quality audio output.

faqs.question: Does Murf AI offer voice cloning?
faqs.answer: Voice cloning is available for Enterprise and API users, requiring a separate agreement and additional costs.
